title: somebody else using my account is it legal ?
body:
now a friend off mine who used to play league a lot a real life friend decided a while ago he had enough he hadn't played in a while said here you want  my account i know you son is leveling an account, i accepted it and have brought champ's for it a name change even
but i thought wait the terms off use says you may not sell transfer or exchange  or transfer
does this apply to the account my son was given to use, it was put in my email address if there is any issues as my friend trust's me and if he wants it back we just switch it back it is no problem at all.
 but i dont want to do anything wrong and have it impact on my account  because we are playing from the same ip address

replies.body: i do only do norm's on both my accounts anyhow but yea ty for the advice

You've answered your own question. The transfer/exchange of accounts is not permitted, mainly because you're claiming to be someone else who has accepted the EULA beforehand.

It's not illegal per se, but just against the terms and conditions. You should probably stop using that account, but it doesn't matter terribly much. You have already understood and agreed to the EULA on another account.

Ultimately it's up to you.
